bonus: Roll 1d8 + half your cleric/paladin levels. Gain that many followers or subtract that number from a dominant religion’s followers and add 1.5x the number to your followers.
Grant one ally this downtime advantage on an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma roll.
Roll 1d10 + half your cleric/paladin levels. Gain that many followers or subtract that number from a dominant religion’s followers and add 1.5x the number to your followers.
You and one other ally get Inspiration on their next quest.
Roll 1d12 + half your cleric/paladin levels. Gain that many followers or subtract that number from a dominant religion’s followers and add 1.5x the number to your followers.
You and 1 ally gain the effects of one of the options of the Ceremony spell. This does not prevent them from benefiting from Ceremony in the future.
You and one ally gain the effect of Death Ward for the next quest you go on.
